dialog.text: Hey %you.first_name%, just finished my third LeetCode problem!  Have you done any problems yet?

joins.text: Well done!  I've done a couple so far.
Oh come on %you.first_name%.  We had a pact!

dialog.text: I think I might be finally getting this javascript stuff.  I had to do a problem with counting integers - and I understood what the problem was - go me!  Have you started writing stuff up yet?

I am just doing a plan for the next 2 weeks.  I have some stuff in my portfolio, but I need to get more reflections done and pull it together.  Tanya has been ignoring me all week and then out of the blue she messaged me about a bug she had found in a login form I'd done.  Normally I wouldn't mind but she wrote it in such a condescending way it really got me riled up.  I am not going to let her get to me!  I need to get some lunch now before the guest lecture starts - see ya!
